one_liner.value: AI-powered finance automation SaaS platform (invoicing, collections, payables, reconciliation)

industry.value: Fintech, Finance automation, Accounting, SME financial services

customer_count.value: 5000+ finance teams (from Core page), 100+ accounting and audit firms (from banner)

press_releases.value: OCTA secures $20M credit facility from Sukna Fund for SME financing in Saudi Arabia; OCTA secures $2.25M pre-seed funding co-led by Quona Capital

notes: Redirects to v2.weareocta.com. SPA that requires JS rendering. Three products: OCTA Core (finance teams), OCTA Flow (accounting firms), AI Agents. SOC2 Type II, PCI DSS, ISO 27001, GDPR, PDPL certified. Jon Santillan is CEO/co-founder. Engineering blog (BTS) with technical content. Integrates with Xero, QuickBooks, Zoho, Wafeq, Oracle, Stripe, HubSpot, Sage, Paymob, Odoo, Microsoft Dynamics.

one_liner.value: Automated fan-powered rewards and marketing platform for ecommerce brands

industry.value: Ecommerce, Sports marketing, Fan engagement, Loyalty and rewards

headquarter_location.value: Not explicitly mentioned, likely US based on sports focus

notes: Single-page website with only 2 internal links (privacy PDF and terms). Has a podcast series called 'Cheers Academy' with 16 episodes featuring sports/ecommerce industry leaders. Concept based on 'conditional rebates' like Jordan's Furniture promotions. Integrates with Shopify. Very few internal pages.

one_liner.value: AI-powered debt collection SaaS platform for the ARM (Accounts Receivable Management) industry

industry.value: Debt collection, Accounts receivable management, Fintech, Credit and collections

employee_count.value: Not mentioned, seed-stage startup hiring founding engineer

competitors.value: Not mentioned, refers to 20-40 year old incumbents

notes: Seed-stage vertical SaaS fintech. Redirects to www.aktos.ai. 6 internal links. Compliance-focused: CFPB, FCRA, FDCPA regulations built into platform. About page mentions $18B revenue recovery industry. Hiring founding staff full stack engineer (remote). Principles: Compliance as Code, Consumer First, Earn Trust, Lead with Transparency. Quote from Alvaro Atienza, Staff SRE.

one_liner.value: unknown - title says 'What the World is Watching' suggesting media measurement

notes: Website is a JavaScript SPA that renders a completely black screen. Title is 'HyphaMetrics - What the World is Watching'. The page requires JavaScript to run but content does not render in browser. No visible content or links could be extracted. Effectively non-functional/under maintenance from a scraping perspective.

one_liner.value: Embedded insurance technology platform (API and no-code integration for fintechs and businesses)

customer_count.value: Neo Financial has 1M+ customers but Walnut's own count not stated

featured_in.value: BetaKit, Insurtech Insights, Business Wire, Fintech Brainfood, Canadian Underwriter, Toronto Star, Insurance Business Magazine, Coverager, Digital Insurance, Fintech.ca

press_releases.value: Walnut secures $4.6M to transform insurance distribution (Aug 2024); National Bank reinvests; BMO partnership announced (Nov 2025); Neo Financial partnership; Walnut secures $4M CAD seed (Dec 2022); Harvest Builders $14M VC fund announcement

conferences.value: SAAS North 2025, Guidewire InsurPitch Las Vegas (ITC Oct 2025), Insurtech North Wolfpack, Fintech Forum Canada 2024 Montreal, Bankers Summit, THIA Innovation Summit Toronto, Fintech Cadence Calgary, Toronto Tech Week, Collisions YYC, Calgary Innovation Week

notes: Founded by Derek Szeto, co-founder Adrien Niblock, COO Jil Macdonald. Extensive press coverage from 2021-2025. Named to Calgary 50 (Canada's most scalable startups). Fastest growing startups in Toronto 2025 (GrowthMentor). SOC 2 Type II compliant. Webflow-based site.

one_liner.value: AI-powered vetted business analyst talent marketplace

industry.value: Consulting, Business analysis, Financial modeling, Strategy, Market research, Data analytics

headquarter_location.value: US, remote-first, global talent pool (Brazil, Malaysia, Kenya mentioned)

employee_count.value: Not stated for internal team. 150+ apprenticeships launched

competitors.value: Not mentioned directly, differentiates from consulting firms and freelancer platforms

notes: Founded 2023 by Jackie Churchwell (ex-Bain, WeWork). CTO: Norbert Pap. Remote-first since start. People-based service - the product IS the analysts. 88.2 NPS score. Structured apprenticeship model. Analysts from global talent pool. Skills include finance, strategy, data, sales operations. Testimonials from Endeavor, Gannett SVP, FarmOp Capital CEO, etc.

one_liner.value: Moment Led Marketing platform for real-time sports fan engagement

industry.value: Sports media, Sportsbooks, Broadcasting, Publishing, Fantasy sports, Teams and leagues

headquarter_location.value: Not explicitly stated, likely US based on sports focus

customer_count.value: USA Today has 53M sports readers served via Data Skrive content

notes: WordPress site. Leader in 'Moment Led Marketing'. Tagline: 'Timing isn't everything, It's the ONLY thing'. Testimonials from AP Global Director, USA Today Senior Director, Sports Tech HQ Executive Director, Bettor Capital Investment Partner. Solutions for sportsbooks, broadcasters, publishers, teams/leagues, fantasy. Single-page homepage with no visible internal navigation links.

one_liner.value: Care management and workforce software for UK care providers, built on Microsoft Power Platform

industry.value: Healthcare, Residential care, Domiciliary care, Social care, Care homes

headquarter_location.value: UK, London (44 Great Cumberland Pl, London, W1H 7BS)

notes: Built on Microsoft Power Platform, integrates with PowerBI. Framer-based website. Modules: HR, Rotas, CRM, Care Planning, Property Manager. Supports residential and domiciliary care. Contact: hello@carepoint365.co.uk, 020 4558 1503. LiveChat widget. Has blog section. Modern Slavery Statement linked. London-based.
